featured.text: On a sunny afternoon last month, we all took off our shoes and walked on the grass with _____ feet.

definition.zh_def: 陽光明媚的，天氣晴朗的
definition.en_def: Characterized by bright sunlight; clear and pleasant weather.
definition.example: It was a sunny day, perfect for a picnic in the park.
